statements: SELECT * FROM remote_work_survey_data;
SELECT survey_id, respondent_id, remote_work_experience FROM remote_work_survey_data WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4;
SELECT survey_id, respondent_id, remote_work_preference FROM remote_work_survey_data WHERE remote_work_experience = 'positive';
SELECT * FROM remote_work_survey_data ORDER BY respondent_id DESC;
SELECT survey_id, satisfaction_rating, feedback FROM remote_work_survey_data WHERE survey_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_survey_data WHERE remote_work_experience = 'Intermediate' ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT survey_id, respondent_id, remote_work_preference FROM remote_work_survey_data WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4 AND remote_work_preference = 'Yes' ORDER BY survey_id ASC;
SELECT respondent_id, feedback FROM remote_work_survey_data WHERE satisfaction_rating < 3 AND remote_work_preference = 'No' ORDER BY respondent_id DESC;
SELECT survey_id, respondent_id, satisfaction_rating FROM remote_work_survey_data WHERE remote_work_experience IN ('Novice','Advanced') ORDER BY respondent_id, survey_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT remote_work_experience FROM remote_work_survey_data WHERE satisfaction_rating = 5 ORDER BY remote_work_experience ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT question, response FROM survey_data WHERE respondent_id = 5;
SELECT respondent_id, name, age FROM respondent_info WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age, email FROM respondent_info WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE question LIKE '%satisfaction%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_data ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT question, response FROM survey_data WHERE respondent_id = 5;
SELECT respondent_id, name, age FROM respondent_info WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT respondent_id, name, email FROM respondent_info WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY respondent_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_responses, response FROM survey_data GROUP BY response;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_preferences WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT preferred_work_location FROM remote_work_preferences WHERE work_hours_per_day >= 6;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_experiences WHERE productivity_rating > 7;
SELECT employee_id, remote_work_duration FROM remote_work_experiences WHERE remote_work_duration < 12;
SELECT feedback_text FROM remote_work_feedback WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_preferences WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT preferred_work_location, work_hours_per_day FROM remote_work_preferences ORDER BY work_hours_per_day DESC;
SELECT employee_id, remote_work_duration, productivity_rating FROM remote_work_experiences WHERE remote_work_duration > 6;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS num_feedbacks FROM remote_work_feedback GROUP BY employee_id HAVING num_feedbacks > 3;
SELECT * FROM SurveyRespondents;
SELECT name, job_title, age FROM SurveyRespondents WHERE age > 30;
SELECT respondent_id, email, company FROM SurveyRespondents WHERE company = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT respondent_id, gender FROM SurveyRespondents WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY respondent_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_value LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM SurveyRespondents;
SELECT name, email, age FROM SurveyRespondents WHERE age > 30;
SELECT r.name, q.question_text, sr.response_value FROM SurveyRespondents r JOIN SurveyResponses sr ON r.respondent_id = sr.respondent_id JOIN SurveyQuestions q ON sr.question_id = q.question_id;
SELECT r.name, sr.overall_satisfaction, sr.work_life_balance_rating, sr.remote_collaboration_rating FROM SurveyRespondents r JOIN SurveyResults sr ON r.respondent_id = sr.respondent_id;
SELECT gender, remote_work_experience, COUNT(*) AS count FROM SurveyRespondents GROUP BY gender, remote_work_experience;
SELECT * FROM survey_participants
SELECT id, name, email FROM survey_participants
SELECT age, gender FROM survey_participants
SELECT question FROM survey_questions
SELECT participant_id, response FROM survey_responses
SELECT * FROM survey_participants WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, email FROM survey_participants WHERE gender = 'Female'

SELECT survey_participants.name, survey_questions.question FROM survey_participants JOIN survey_responses ON survey_participants.id = survey_responses.participant_id JOIN survey_questions ON survey_responses.question_id = survey_questions.id WHERE survey_responses.response = 'Yes'

SELECT survey_participants.name AS participant_name, work_preferences.preference AS preference FROM survey_participants JOIN work_preferences ON survey_participants.id = work_preferences.participant_id WHERE work_preferences.preference = 'Remote'
SELECT * FROM survey_participants WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 30
